I have a love hate relationship, I love the core gameplay of the game, playing with expert bots that test my experience without having insane spray control + 1 tap control like the crackheads of online these days.
Everyone thinks they are gonna be the next CSGO legend, you will only be a legend if you are naturally wired and don't really need caffeine to be hyper focused, also if you only play this game for the next 5 years.
